messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Voting
messages.messageBody:
<Cacie joined an online group... that was trying to lower the voting age.
>


How fascinating! I had never considered such a group might exist. I
think my son would be very interested in something like this. Thank you
for the info / idea.
Deb L

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Voting
messages.msgSnippet: ... Cacie joined an online group 3 years ago (when she was 5) that was trying to lower the voting age. They were mostly teens, she was probably the youngest
messages.messageBody:
On Thu, 27 Sep 2001 13:50:04 -0600 ddzimlew@... writes:

> As the mom of a nine year old who believes himself to be equal to any
> person or task, I have a problem with age limits ( just ask him how he
> feels about not being old enough to vote!)

Cacie joined an online group 3 years ago (when she was 5) that was trying
to lower the voting age. They were mostly teens, she was probably the
youngest person who had joined, but the voting age thing really bothered
her, too. I'm not sure what happened to the group, they were having a lot
of internal problems with leadership, but I think it's a good idea..

Daron
